places_to_visit.name: Potala Palace
places_to_visit.description: Potala Palace is an iconic Tibetan structure and was once the winter residence of the Dalai Lama. It’s renowned for its stunning architecture and historical significance.

places_to_visit.name: Jokhang Temple
places_to_visit.description: Jokhang Temple is one of the most sacred Tibetan Buddhist temples. It houses a revered statue of the Buddha and is a major pilgrimage site for Tibetan Buddhists.

places_to_visit.name: Norbulingka
places_to_visit.description: Norbulingka is the summer residence of the Dalai Lama. It features beautiful gardens and palaces and provides insight into Tibetan culture and history.

places_to_visit.name: Sera Monastery
places_to_visit.description: Sera Monastery is one of the great Tibetan monasteries known for its debate sessions among monks. It’s a place to experience Tibetan monastic life and culture.

places_to_visit.name: Drepung Monastery
places_to_visit.description: Drepung Monastery is a major Tibetan Buddhist monastery that was once one of the largest and most influential in Tibet. It’s known for its spiritual and historical importance.
